sentences.english: Seen here within the glomeruli are crescents composed of proliferating epithelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 腎小球內由增生的壁層上皮細胞組成的新月體。

sentences.english: This is a PAS stain of nodular glomerulosclerosis (Kimmelstiel-Wilson disease) in a patient with long-standing diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 長期糖尿病病人結節性腎小球硬化的PAS染色。

sentences.english: The glomeruli show irregular thickening and splitting of basement membranes.
sentences.chinese: 腎小球表現爲不規則增厚，基底膜分離。

sentences.english: The number of branching ureteric bud could control nephron developmental decisions.
sentences.chinese: 輸尿管芽分支多寡是決定腎小球和腎小管數量的關鍵。

sentences.english: The capillary loops of this glomerulus contain fat globules in a patient with fat embolism syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 該脂肪栓塞患者的腎小球毛細血管腔內含有脂肪滴。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of Losartan on patients with chronic glomerulonephritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討科素亞治療慢性腎小球腎炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: The glomerular filtration rate remains relatively constant .
sentences.chinese: 腎小球濾過率也能保持恆定。

sentences.english: No significant changes were observed in glomerular filtration rate and rennin activity after administration of RDA.
sentences.chinese: 用藥前後腎小球濾過率和腎素活性均無顯著性差異。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate effects of chloride channel blockers on proliferation of mesangial cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氯通道阻滯劑對腎小球系膜細胞增殖的作用。

sentences.english: Losartan can suppress urinary albumin and glomerular hypertrophy in renal tissue.
sentences.chinese: 氯沙坦可降低尿白蛋白及阻遏早期腎小球肥大。

sentences.english: The afferent arteriole was often traveled in the central part of the area of the polar cushion cell.
sentences.chinese: 極墊細胞區的微血管與腎小球的微血管直接延續。

sentences.english: Renal glomeruli had hyaline changes suggestive of an immunologic process.
sentences.chinese: 腎小球有表明免疫學過程的玻璃樣變化。

sentences.english: Conclusions There is already early pathological feature of glomerulosclerosis in the glomeruli of normal aging kidneys.
sentences.chinese: 結論老年人腎小球已具有腎小球硬化的早期病理基礎。

sentences.english: Conclusions There is already early pathological feature of glomerulosclerosis in the glomeruli of normal aging kidneys.
sentences.chinese: 結論老年人腎小球已具有腎小球硬化的早期病理基礎。

sentences.english: Nephrotic syndrome is usually caused by damage to the clusters of tiny blood vessels (glomeruli) of your kidneys.
sentences.chinese: 如前所述，腎病綜合症一般是由腎小球受損造成的。

sentences.english: The grape keeps out in the renal glomerulus is broad.
